text:
Day 2: Moderna #COVID19 #vaccine 
Happy to say no fever, chills, or aches, only a sore arm & shoulder. Less of a reaction than from flu shot. Hubby works with a guy whose mom got Moderna/Covid arm rash after her 2nd shot. This is my first so 🤞I don't get it yet. #vaccinated https://t.co/sJkm6GkU18
